content.rendered:
Walls of Books at GABBS

We held our annual franchise meeting at the Great American Bargain Book Show last week in Atlanta. We also had a booth to educate visitors about our franchise option.

Bestselling Inventory

Here’s a look at some of the great inventory we’re sending to our stores this week.

Ladies’ Night Out

excerpt.rendered: We held our annual franchise meeting at the Great American Bargain Book Show last week in Athens. We also had a booth to educate visitors about our franchise option.
